availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Butt (Caldwell County / Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer / Farm manager )

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Zachariah Butt and Elizabeth Butt. Married to Sarah E. Kennedy Butt in Trigg County, Kentucky, on January 1, 1857. Father of W. R. Butt and R. C. Butt. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm manager is Trigg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 360B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 65.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 182.
"William Washington Butt (1831-1897)," Find A Grave, Memorial #54982140, accessed July 20, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/54982140.
